alert.note: Alert for Lee; Macon; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 2:48PM CDT until August 15 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lee County in east central Alabama... Northeastern Macon County in southeastern Alabama... South central Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 248 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Reeves Airport, or near Tallassee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Tuskegee, Tallassee, Notasulga, Franklin, Liberty City, Reeves Airport, Auburn University, Tallapoosa City, Tuskegee National Forest, Loachapoka, I 85 Rest Area, Uphapee Creek, Chewacla State Park, Reeltown, Moton Field Municipal Airport and Yates Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
